Posts.Content: Hi guys  I got my letter yesterday telling me when chemo will start while I was reading it I went hot  13-04-16 @ 10.30 the day before I have a tour guide round the department  it is the unknown what do I do before chemo ? what do I eat? when do the side effects start? I got my report I have stage 1 grade 3 size of lump 2.8cm her2 negative  oestrogen receptor positive . can I drive home? my onclist said she was going to give me 4 of one drug and 4 of the other the dugs are docetaxel and ec I said why 4 she then said after 3 on docetaxel we will do a MRI did anyone on this site have 3 of one and 3 of the other or 4 any advice please can you help
Posts.Title: CHEMO TO START

Posts.Content: Hi my friends  I can only talk how i feel on this site I had 3x Docetaxel then they did a MRI the test has shown the lunp has gone bigger so that means still growing they are now going to change me to EC I just want to no has any body had the same experience where the chemo did not work? and if so did the other one work I just think did I have the first one for nothing to go through all those side effects.   I even told the oncologist I don't mind if you have got the wrong name I won't even sue you I will just give you flowers and a card she just looked at me I have had enough I just want it all over please please can anyone help me
Posts.Title: lump is got bigger

Posts.Content: Hi little wren I was where you are today I was told I have breast  cancer on the 8-3-16 I didn't bring anyone with me I put on my favourite colour top and in I went when the breast surgeon told me it is cancer I think I went into shock I remember saying OK and then he started talking and that was it I didn't know what he was saying he could of told me he was David Beckham I would of said yes you need to bring someone with you even if it good news or bad this site is so good I have been singing it's praise  please let us know how you get on xx
Posts.Title: Waiting for diagnosis
